pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, March 30, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Williams Lake, British Columbia

Private meetings

The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Marc Miller, will meet with the Chief of Williams Lake First Nation Willie Sellars, Council Members, Elders, residential school Survivors, and other members of the community.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
